signals.problem_statement: The current process of using shared mailboxes and subfolders in Microsoft Outlook is inefficient for tracking email assignments and responses.
signals.customer_ask: We wanted to assess Hiver to see if there might be a good fit there.
signals.context: Pharmaceutical organization with multiple business units and 1,300 emails received daily across four shared mailboxes.

signals.problem_statement: There is a need for better automation and categorization of incoming emails to improve workflow efficiency.
signals.customer_ask: It would be good to learn what are the possibilities in Hiver and how we could leverage its capabilities.
signals.context: Pharmaceutical organization with multiple business units and 1,300 emails received daily across four shared mailboxes.

signals.problem_statement: The customer lacks visibility into email handling and response times, which affects their ability to manage customer inquiries effectively.
signals.customer_ask: Being able to sort of detect long-standing issues would be valuable for us.
signals.context: Pharmaceutical organization with multiple business units and 1,300 emails received daily across four shared mailboxes.

signals.problem_statement: The customer is unable to easily test Hiver without connecting an existing shared mailbox, which complicates the trial process.
signals.customer_ask: I almost just want to test with a test one.
signals.context: Pharmaceutical organization looking to pilot Hiver with multiple user accounts.
